General.Name: VIX Securities JSC
General.Description: VIX Securities Joint Stock Company engages in the brokerage, dealing, and underwriting of securities in Vietnam. It also offers securities investment advisory services. The company was formerly known as IB Securities Joint Stock Company and changed its name to VIX Securities Joint Stock Company in October 2020. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam.
